content.detailedDescription: My daughter and myself were riding our atvs north of our home when we bothstopped to point out an object directly in front of us . it was just sitting inthe middle of the ski . at first i thought it was an airliner . the it movedvary fast to the north of us and stopped then went east stopped and droppedabout 1000 ft . then without turning went north stopped and then just zip, itwas gone . it went north east of us .While it was in site we could hear anelectical buzz. i tried to call home on my cell phone but my battery level waslow . which is odd i thought do to the fact i had just charged it . also we hadtrouble with our atvs sputering out for a few minutes . this happened 011703.Your calinder does not go to the new year .
content.summary: I saw a silvery object which looked almost like gl

content.detailedDescription: I was walking the dogs about 730pm when i first noticed a bright flashing lightin the sky, larger than a star. at first glance i thought it may be an airplane,although i watched it for over an hour while it stayed hovering, never moving,and also right away i realized airplanes dont exhibit such an unusual spectrumof flashing colors. i decided to go in and get my friends and family, they allwitnessed this strange light that hadnt been there before. we all counted manydifferent colored lights, even more clearly through binoculars. everyone wasstunned, never having seen such a thing before. nobody could identify theobject. it is still there hovering in the same location. 1000pm

I everytime  look there they are always look with my binoculars towards the sky.I expect to see this object i think the objects are not from this world i amvery curios as to what  exactly  iam  seeing the object it  just hovers  the itjust  vanishes some times if blink  it  just vanishess

While driving on i-10, from el paso, tx. to silver city, nm. i sighted twoseparate cigar shaped objects hovering over one of the mountains in the area. this was east of deming and around a town called aieko.  i only got a glimpse ofone of the objects, as it moved out of the area traveling se, very rapidly.  theother object seemed to hover in one place, then slowly moved in an westerlydirection, paralell to i-10.  i lost sight of this when i entered deming.  bothobjects were very similar in size and shape.
content.summary: Ufo sighting east of deming, new mexico

content.detailedDescription: Lousiville, kentuckymy fiance and i were driving north on hwy 65 south of louisville, ky at about7:30 pm on our way to ohio.  the sky was dark but relatively clear.  i wasdriving and noticed two winged objects about half a mile to one mile distant, heading easterly from the west side of 65.  i wouldnt have thought anythingexcept for the excessive number of collision lights on each craft, at least 10lights were observed.This would disclude the crafts from being any known civilian or military craftas they generally have one to three lights, no more as it is redundant andconfusing to air controllers in towers to see that many lights approaching theirairspace.I could discern no true shape, as i was driving and i was, at first, thinkingthey were cargo ships from the military heading for a landing.  what threw meoff were the number of lights, and the fact that i dont recall any military orcivilian air fields in that vicinity, about 20 min south of louisville.  therewere two craft in formation, one directly behind the other, and they were quitelow, as if on approach.I did not stop, i did not see if they crossed the highway, and have no idea whatthey may have been.  having been in the marine corps air wing, i am stillfamiliar with military and civilian aircraft, and my instinct is that these wereneither.

We were in brown county texas on new years eve 2001 when we noticed somethingthat looked like an airplane low on the horizon in the southeast sky.  wenoticed it had what looked like one bright white light, it looked like it wouldflash a red light much like an airplane. when we looked at it through atelescope it looked completely different it was round in shape with lightsspaced around the bottom. between each light there was what looked like chaserlights. each light around the outter circle connected to the light opposite itwith what looked like chaser lights. these light would change shapes anddirection of flashing making the lights look like diamond shapes, plaid shapesand cone shapes.  we watched it for several hours and noticed it moved veryslowly upward and toward the south. by 400am  it was back in the lowersoutheastern sky where it started.Where there any other sightings on new years eve
content.summary: Round circle of flashing lightschanging lights

content.detailedDescription: Ero in macchina, ho visto solamente una luminosissima luce che attraversava ilcielo e che spariva nel nulla. non poteva essere una stella cadente perche8 era troppo grande ed era rossa, non poteva essere un aereo perche8 era troppo veloce. la luce ha attraversato una porzione di cielo ede8 sparita velocemente.

I have always ben extreamly sceptical about everything but after tonight i cannot overlook how evedent it is that tair are ufos out thair. wether govermentexperiment ships or extre tarestrials. me and my girl friend wer driving downthe road when i knoticed 3 lights brighter thain car lights in the sky. ipointed them out to her and she wondered what they wer becouse thair wer notowers in that town that would explain for the lights. we pulled over in frontof this big catholic church and it was a boomerang shaped ship hovering over thechurch. it had 3 lights on it one at each end of it and one on the tip of the v.The ship took off as soon as we pulled over and headid in the direction we hadcome. it traveled very slowly at first and gradually speedid up. we triedfollowing it but it eventually got so fast that it was gone in a short wile. theship traveled in the direction that its v shapet point was pointing and thairwas no body. like just the wings of a plain. it was only aobut 200 yards abovethe ground and never got any higher as far as we could see. we could both makeout its shape and 2 other lights that blinked withch wer mutch smaller and werread and blue. the reason we are shure it was a ufo or a govermential thing isbecouse it made absolutly no sound at all. wile it hovered and as it took off itwas compleatly quiet. this was real and if amyone has seen anything like it iwould love to hear about it. my aim sn is oooadamstadeooo
content.summary: We saw a bommerang shaped ship hover than leave si

content.detailedDescription: I was just leaving my girlfriends house in a suburban neighborhood in my hometown. i was getting onto my motorcycle getting ready to start it. i looked upfrom the instrument panel momentarily and saw it. i was at the top of a hill soit was at eye level. i was not sure what it was. i just stared at it as it sovery silently hovered there. then it tilted forward about 90 degrees and then iheard an almost mechanical sound as it tilted and also a light or beam of somesort was focused on a fixed spot on the ground. after tilting it became silentonce more and hovered with its lightbeam still shining. then it tilted back 90degrees to its origional position once again making a similar but not the samesound as before and the light was turned off. it hovered there for about 15 moreseconds. then suddenly i saw the fastest moving object i have ever seen in mylife shoot directly upwards with instantanious velocity. during this there was asound of rushing of wind that kind of whistled like a firework. well the wholetime there was a woman next door working in her yard who had obviously seen theobject too, we where approxomatley 8 feet from each other. we looked at eachother with that blank shocked look on our faces. then she said, it was probablya helicopter. i replied, yeah probably a helicopter, i then started mymotorcycle and went home.

My brother and i and 2 friends were playing marbles in our yard when a colorfulgas cloud came over us very slowly just passing along at a very slow speed. wedidnt know what it was. we just thought it was gas but gas wouldnt behave in theair the way this did.

1.  granite city high school football field -  waiting for 4th of july fireworksto begin.2.  seen it as it was coming right toward us and then turned to its left.3.  no ideal.4.  amazed.  watched intensely trying to understand what was happening, what itwas andor what it was going to do.5.  round in shape.  size of a beach ball.  color different shades of blue towhite which seem transparent while being slightly illumated.  travel toward usat roughtly 20 miles per hour.  going from 600 feet down to 100 and then back to600.  made trun from north direction to west.  went between two buildings. smooth flight at a steady speed.  lightcolors slightly seem to change as objectwent by.6. flew out of sight.
content.summary: Observed in flight a round blueishtransparent obje

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were out doing yard work saturday aug 10 about 900 pm when inoticed an object as brite as venus traveling from the south west travelingnortheast. we both witnessed this object. the next night aug 11 we decided tohave a campfire and watch for ufos.I had my camcorder and filmed an object as itflew completly silent with no visable marker lights. it travel from the west tothe east. i watched the skys for the next three nights and shot some more videoof the same object thee nights later on the 14th . the sky on all the night wereclear with no clouds. we live in a rural setting with no sound or lightpollution. it defintly not a satilte  as we see many of them. all though ithought it might be the space station but i should have seen it between the twovideos that i shot.

we were walking west along the south shore of lake ontario. i first noticed the object off in the distance and thought it was a star off in the distance. i was more currious than anything when i first saw it. it started moving around then hovering. it appeard to touch the lake then went up into the air and broke into several pieces. they were brighly lite and continualy changed colours. i thought it might have been an aircraft until i saw a air plane fly behind it. i lost site of them when they took off a a fast speed.

My parents and i were driving home from christmas on the square in weatherford,texas, at 720 pm on december 13. we live about 12 miles northewst of town, justnorth of the little tiny town of peaster. my father did not see the object, butboth my mother and i did. we were heading north on fm920 about 1 12 miles northof peaster when i noticed a large green star-like object off to the northeast.It hovered above the trees and house lights. i was about to ask if anyone elsesaw it when my mother said, do you see that big green lightmy father was driving and could not look. he had slowed the car to turn westonto dry creek road. the intersection is at a low spot, so at this  point i lostsight of the object. once we had turned onto dry creek road, and topped thefirst hill, i could see the object above the hill. it was to the left of a lightfrom a house on the corner. my mother and i were talking about the light, so mydad turned the car around to go back for a better look. i lost sight of theobject until we had crossed the intersection again, heading east on dry creekroad. at this point, at the summit of a hill, i could see the area where thelight had been but it was gone.The light was larger than the average star or planet, about the size of thehouse lights i could see below it. there are no hills in the vicinity where theobject hovered. it was above the houses and trees. we drove this same routeagain about a week later, also at night, and saw nothing.
content.summary: Green light hovering above the countryside

content.detailedDescription: Around 2340 h local time on january 4th i was stargazing in front of my house, when i noticed a moving green light. first i thought that i saw a position light of an airplane as live just 30 km away from schiphol airport. i soon realised that the light was much to bright for a position light of an airplane. furthermore the light dropped a small red light that descended in a straight vertical line as the main object moved on from se to sw. the brightness of the main object was about magnitude -4, about as bright as venus. the small light that was dropped was as bright as magnitude 1. the object moved quite slowly but seemed to accelerate slightly as the colour changed from green to red. after that the object stood still en hovered for some moments, when the brightness decreased. the decrease in brightness stood still for a moment or so before it diminished completely. all the time the object moved stood the same height above the horizon. during the hovering of the object i managed to run  into my house and fetched a binocular. the object didn't really show up different through the bino, just a blob of light, but i had the impression that the light of the object was reflected by some background structure. as i am scientifically trained and a keep a strong interest in astronomy i really didn't think i witnessed something extraterrestrial. nevertheless i can't explain what i saw. my best guess is that i saw some unconventional military flying object.

When i first saw the object, i was waiting at a bus stop. i was at wal-mart, which is next to the airport, so i was watching a plane i thought. it was  silver, metallic and the morning sun was reflecting from it. i kept watching it, because i was looking for the wings, i couldnt see them i thought because of the angle of the plane . i watched it for about 5 minutes. i never  saw the wings, it wasnt far away ,  i never heard any plane sounds, i also didnt see anyother aircraft during this time period. it appeared to be floating in a ne direction. i lost sight of it. i was just thinking about it and trying to figure out this puzzle. no sound, no wings, heading in the direction of my home. after i realized i had seen a ufo pretty sure i got excited and scared. i have seen 5 other ufos, many years ago. they were all at night. this was in broad daylight.  my 14 year old son saw an alien in his bedroom last summer. he screamed and was scared to death for months to go to sleep. i had to start praying for him every night to not be scared or see anything else.He said he could see through it.  it went out of sight. i felt like it was watching me and going to my house. afterward, i just couldnt believe it happened. i kept saying to myself i just saw a da ufo. i told some people on the bus about it, someone said, thats a rod. i just cant get over it, or believe it that it really happened, and wonder what it means, to my life, my sons, or the people in this area.  anna davis

I walked outside on the patio with our dogs and i sat in one of the chairs tosmoke. it was a beautiful, cool and calm daynew years day and i looked up to seehow clear the whole sky was. nearly straight above i saw some white objects andat first thought they were seagulls since i had seen a flock the previous week.But they looked more like lights and there were 3 forming a perfect triangle andone directly below them. i could not see any wing movement, just a steadywhite.They seemed to be very high, higher than most planes i have seen here. iwatched them for a moment and the 3 moved slowly into an elongated trianglewhile the 4th remained the same distance below. i called a friend on the phonebut she didnt see them she looked up. she lives about 40 blocks south and 1.5miles east my friend inside came out and i had to point them out to her. she sawthem and said they were birds. by this time the 3 had formed a perfect verticalline with the 4th one still the same distance from then. they had moved towardsthe east. the 3 once again moved into a perfect triangle, then an elongated oneand a straight veritcal line with the 4th one moving at the same speed with themto the east. they began to fade and then i couldnt see any of them. i saw twoplanes during this time about 15 minutes but i dont recall anything more thanthey were at a much lower altitude, one traveling nw to se and one e to w. ialso saw a few birds at about 300 feet.

We were inside on the computer and it turned off all of a sudden.  so we checkedoutside at the power lines and saw a see-through object coming toward theground.  we also saw lights flashing.  we started to get really scared and wehid.  we watched from a distance and took pictures of it, well, kindof squirtingout gas like liquid.  its hard to describe.  transparent.  well all of a suddenit got up and flew away.  but the shadows all around are, its almost like thereis something there.  im afraid to go near a shadow now.  sometimes i still seethings there.

I was at baseball practice when something in the sky caught my attention.  ilooked up and saw 12-15 disc shaped objects flying in a infinite shaped motion. i showed a few friends who also saw the lights.  they continued flying for aboutfive minutes when all of the sudden they steadily grew brighter and then shotoff in all different directions.  i called the local tlelevision stations andreported what i had seen.  of course their response was as expected.  they triedto tell me that ihad seen some weather related phenomena.  which from myperspective was completely and utterly impossible.  what i had seen could nothave been swamp gas, or venus for that matter.  it was i am convinced somethingnot explainable by any means so for. i hope that i have something here that canbe substantiated.  this was only the first sighting.
content.summary: I saw 12 to 15 disk-shaped objects in a figure eig

content.detailedDescription: I was in springfield, ill. with my mother and brother to go to the ill. statefair in 1952. we were staying with my aunt. her sisters husband harry liebermanfrom chicago and i were out in the yard with a clear view of the sky. we were at211 w. jackson st. which was about 2 or 3 block from the ill. state capitol,where my aunt was the assistant sec. to the govenor of the state.I just happen to look up an toward the capitol bldg. when i saw a blueish greenlight slowly moving over and above the capitol bldg., when i pointed to it harrylieberman also saw it. there was no sound, the round basketball looking lightmove from the ne to the se over the top of the capitol bldg. it was dark and thetime was around 800 to 830 pm.  the next day my aunt looked in the springfieldpaper an the article said,  strange light spotted around, i think, lake lehlandor one of the lake very close to springfield.  you should be able to get thearticle if they still have it from the newspaper.  i am 61 years old, collegeeducated, picked to serve on a school board in a town of 7,500 people.  the is atrue statement to the best of my knowledge base on what i saw with my own eyesand what harry saw with his.  harry died several years ago.  the bldg. that westay in was moved several years ago for the capitol to expand, i think.  thenews paper article might still exist.Ron medler
content.summary: Springfield, il in the last of july or the first

content.detailedDescription: I need to talk to someone, this form just wont do for what ive been through.

I was outside my brothers house smoking when i happenned to look up and saw atriangular lit up object overhead. i cannot be sure if was visible or if ilooked as it became visible. i watched it fly for 2-3 seconds and then theobject literally dissappeared - perhaps into the clouds but it really did notadd up. there was absolutely no sound associated with this object. the objectwas triangular with lights on the three axis points  white but with less brightwhite lights that seemed to run around the frame of the object. it seemedperhaps that other points of the craft was glowing. i was amazed when i saw theobject and still am to some degree. the sighting was only 3-4 seconds and mybuddy was with me, but i stopped and watched the object almost awestruck and wasjust calling out to my buddy when it dissappeared. the object was moving on astraight path course as i was watching it. later that night, i had dreams thatrelated to my health.
content.summary: Triangle shaped ufo in northeast ohio

content.detailedDescription: Turned the corner from the front of the house to go to the back of the house totake out the garbage.  was facing se. dont know what it was that made me lookup, i think i may have noticed the light.  it was a perfect white circle, like abaseball and was illuminated.  it moved as fast or faster than a meteor seen ina meteor shower.  ive never seen anything move that fast.  i waited for a noisebecause i thought i would hear one if it had been an airplane, but there was nonoise.  im not good a judging height, but it was lower than a small airplanewould fly and seemed to be about the same height above the trees as they aretall i would guess the trees are appx. 30-40 feet tall.  it really startled me. ive never seen anything else like that.  i was thinking it may be a meteorshower and looked up at the sky.  the sky was perfectly clear and i could seelots of stars.  i stood outside a few minutes to see if there were meteors, butdid not observe anything else.  please note that we do seem to be in some sortof flight pattern from the seymour johnson air force base, but this was too lowand went way faster than anything ive seen come to and from there.  it went inan arc from above my head to appx. 40 degrees above the horizon and justdisappeared.

As i was outside i was ready to leave as i saw something that looked like abunch of ballons as i watched them i saw they were staying together in a groupand not moveing away from each other, this lasted for about a 12hr as i saw myneighbor that is a police officer pull up i asked him to look at it as well andi even called my city police to see if there was any militay flying going on orthe local airport reporting any thing. this is not the first time i have seenanything strange like this, i grew up in nm and saw something there that waseven stranger but being a kid at the time i called my mom out to look at it andshe saw it as well. and i do have some marks on my leg and arm that i have noclue where they came from

i was wondering if anyone else has had a sighting yesterday tuesday 11/10/02.  i think i may have.  it was about 10:45 or maybe even closer to 11pm.  i was driving my car onto i-95 from okeechobee (in west palm beach).  you have to drive up the ramp and then back down to get on 95.  as i was approaching the top of the ramp, i saw lights out at the corner of my eyes to the left.  i didnt pay attention to it (probably just thought an airplane or something).  anyway, the lights were angled in the sky and as the turned again i looked up to the left and whoa!!  it was a line of lights in a row (connected like this: ***********) a straight line of lights.  thats all i could get a glimpse of.  the lights then shut off suddenly. i slowed my car to  a stop on the top of the ramp.  looked out of my car and saw a dark object. no lights at all. i couldnt tell the shape because it all happend kind of fast.  all i know is that the object was darker than the sky and it was moving.  it was really moving fast, but when i got out to look more...........The thing was gone.  i saw it moving southeast but only for a matter of seconds.  i couldnt see it anymore...........Like it vanished.  i know this must sound pretty weird, but thats what i saw.  the hole sighting was only about a minute or two if that.  wish i payed more attention initially because i probably would have seen more.  i was near the airport and i could see other planes in the sky, but this thing was definitely something else.  strange.  i even felt a little strange about it after.  if i think about it now.........It almost seems as if i dont believe myself..........Like i was daydreaming...............Weird.  please let me know if anyone else or if there was anything in the news that day about anything like i described.  thanks.  i have enclosed a drawing of what it sort of looked like using adobe photoshop.  very similar to what i saw.  but when the lights went out............Im not really sure what it looked like............Just like a dark black object.
content.summary: I saw lights out of the corner of my eye, cigar sh

content.detailedDescription: I was seven years old and was playing in my backyard. my 3 year old brother wasalso outside, but was not with me. i heard a low buzzhumming which sounded oddto me because i have been around airplanesjets all my life and was not used tothat sound. i looked to the northwest and saw what i thought was a blimp, but ilooked closely and saw i was wrong. all i could do was stare at it in fear anddisbelief. i couldnt even think at the time. the object was shaped like asilver, metalic blimp with a moving ring on it. the ring had what appeared to bewindows that were emitting an orange glow. the object was flying like a duckwould walk, wobbling and unsteady.I was young at the time, so my only instictwas to grab my brother and run inside the house. i locked nyself in my parentsbedroom and felt a tiggling,numb sensation and fear still growing inside me.When i looked out the window carefully, and saw it was darker outside than aminute before, and that my dogs were acting strangely, like they had seen it aswell. when my parents noticed a change in my i told them, and they thought i wasnuts. my brother did not see it, so i had no proof. but ever since then, i havehad an interest in the paranormal and have looked for more ufos.
content.summary: Saw metalic craft with bright orange lights

content.detailedDescription: I was camping north east of parry sound on nine mile lake. at the time i washanging a tarp above my tent in case the snow started coming down hard. as i wastying on of the tarp corners to a tree i was looking up a bit when i had noticeda dimly lit object in the sky, fairly close to the horizon. it was moving slow,appearing to be getting closer to me. there was no sound emitted but i didnotice that as it moved closer my ears started to react like they do when youtravel up or down a large hill. like they wanted to pop. as it moved closer myears started to ring a little but aside from that i could not hear any soundbeing emitted, just sound pressure. i was on a point that overlooked a goodportion of the lake. the object appeared to slow down and hover just above thetreeline across the lake. it appeared to be shaped like a cylinder with curvedwings on each side that had a curve to them. there were dim red lights on eachwing, solidly lit and three red lights in the center that were slightly brighterbut not by much. as the object came to hover it adjusted its angle slightly andleaned forward. it sat stationary for a short while and i was very intrigued byits presence.  i noticed that my coleman flourescent lamp that i had hanging inthe tree was shimmering  pulsing a little. i also noticed static on my radiowhich gradually increased as the object approached  hovered. my hearing wassomewhat impaired as sounds were reduced and muffled since there was a pressure.I swallowed several times to try and get them to pop but they would not. iturned my back on it momentarily to grab my handheld spotlight and then i shoneit on the surface which appeared to be grayish but somewhat reflective. i alsonoticed a thick protruding rod that looked like an antenna and anotherprotruding rod of the same thickness beside it but it had a sort of cage on theend of it that kind of looked like the end of a whisk. these two rods were inthe center of the object, behind the three red lights. after a short while theobject angled back up and slowly moved sideways down the treeline. i moved aheada little to watch it leave. within moments the lights faded out and i could nolonger see it. the radio static gradually returned to normal as the object movedaway and the light had stopped acting up. my ears were still affect but after alittle bit of time had pas
content.summary: Silent illuminated object seen hovering in ontario

content.detailedDescription: This experience was about 8 years ago, i have told the story many time to friensand relitives now i wish to share it with others.I was asleep in my bedroom when through my slumber i could see bright lights,blue, green, red, and clear, i immidiatly woke and thought maybe i was a caraccident on the street next to my home and this was fire, or police lights, istarted to get up.. and then realized i was floating above my bed an the lightswere in my room floating near the ceiling and inside these lights were humanlike faces.  there was uncomfortable feeling though my whole body my insideswere like pulling out anpushing in at the same time.  i couldnt move  then the orbs with faces began totalk to me in perfect english not to be afraid they meant no harm and wanted tosay goodbye to me and thank me for all the help i was to them over the years  idont remember helping, or having experience with them before.  however they alllooked so familiar to me, they told me they would not be back to contact meagain, one of the intities offered me a chance to leave with them,  but i wassingle parent with small child they understood this.I awoke the next morning very exhausted and feeling rather strange, i rememberedeverthing perfectly and thought holy sh--  that dream was so reallater that day, i was raking leaves in the back yard and my nieghbor lady calledme over the fence and said wayne  how in the earth did you get those coloredballs of light to flty right in your kitchen window and float through your house she was awake reading at that time of the night, and noticed the orbs fly intomy window, it felt like someone knocked the wind out of me, i had that gutfeeling this was not  a dream.  over the next couple of months i had memories ofbeing in a ship that took me to another planet and showed me and explained manywonderful and unusal things, example of totaly different style of sailing boat,different games, music and telepathy.  if you would care to contact me feelfree, as i would share this in detail to those willing to listenb or take anypolygraph test.Thankyou for your interestwayne evans
content.summary: Saw orbs of colored light with human features insi

content.detailedDescription: I was at my dads house in jackson where i live. i went outside to go to thegarage, looked up because there was lightning and saw this white sphere thatkind of resembled a star in luminance. i thought it was a falling star untilit started making a humming sound like a motor,then all the sudden the soundwas high pitched. then it took off with a blue trail behind it and i heard afaint bang sound.I didnt have time to get a camera, so i went over the scenarioa few times in my head so i would remember the experience as vividly aspossible. i was pretty calm through the whole thing. after it took off i raninside and told my dad and brother that i just saw a ufo above the garrage.I felt elated because this was the closest ive ever been to a ufo.Me and a close friend had seen something very similar about a year ago.It was on a trip to clarksdale, ms about 3000 ft in the sky and silver,sphere shaped and it took off at about the same speed as this one.It was daytime and we didnt notice any trails or sound.
content.summary: Sphere shaped ufo seen in jackson, ms

content.detailedDescription: We were walking along a sidewalk in an east to west direction at about 11 pm.Rob happened to look straight overhead and called our attention to two small,fuzzy objects, close together. they were closer together than the stars inorions sword and about as bright, but a little larger. the fuzziness could havebeen due to the somewhat humid conditions. although moving east3e west at a very high speed and, what appeared to be a very high altitude, theywere criss-crossing each other in a figure 8 fashion. they moved from directlyoverhead to about 70 degrees above the horizon in about 3-4 seconds. at thatpoint, they disappeared behind a hazy cloud. my wife, always skeptical aboutufos is not so skeptical any more i am a computer professional in a local schooldistrict and rob is a history teacher in a middle school. my wife was employedas a teachertechnician in an elementary media center at the time.
